update rf_user
login_count = (case when login_count is null then #{record.loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else login_count + #{record.loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{record.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{record.reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
bind_pad_max = (case when bind_pad_max is null then #{record.bindPadMax,jdbcType=INTEGER} else bind_pad_max + #{record.bindPadMax,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_online_time = (case when left_online_time is null then #{record.leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_online_time + #{record.leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
rbc_amount = (case when rbc_amount is null then #{record.rbcAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else rbc_amount + #{record.rbcAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
invite_user_id = (case when invite_user_id is null then #{record.inviteUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else invite_user_id + #{record.inviteUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

update rf_user
login_count = (case when login_count is null then #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else login_count + #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
bind_pad_max = (case when bind_pad_max is null then #{bindPadMax,jdbcType=INTEGER} else bind_pad_max + #{bindPadMax,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
left_online_time = (case when left_online_time is null then #{leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} else left_online_time + #{leftOnlineTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
rbc_amount = (case when rbc_amount is null then #{rbcAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else rbc_amount + #{rbcAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
invite_user_id = (case when invite_user_id is null then #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else invite_user_id + #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE rf_user
rbc_amount = COALESCE(rbc_amount, 0) + #{rbcAmount},
modifier = #{modifier},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select:
UPDATE rf_user
bound_pad_count = COALESCE(bound_pad_count, 0) + #{count},
WHERE user_id=#{userId} returning bound_pad_count
mapper.update:
update rf_user set limit_use = #{limitUse} where user_mobile_phone IN
#{item}

update rf_user set limit_use = #{limitUse} where external_user_id IN
#{item}
